mapper.insert: insert into t_board_content(grp_id, user_idx, brd_title, brd_content, read_count, parent_brd_idx, brd_depth, top_flag, del_flag, secret_flag, reg_ip, reg_password, prd_url, brd_short, brd_good_count, brd_title_img_real_path, reg_nm, reg_dt) values ( #{grp_id}, #{user_idx}, #{brd_title}, #{brd_content}, #{read_count}, #{parent_brd_idx}, #{brd_depth}, #{top_flag}, #{del_flag}, #{secret_flag}, #{reg_ip}, #{reg_password}, #{prd_url}, #{brd_short}, #{brd_good_count}, #{brd_title_img_real_path}, #{reg_nm}, #{reg_dt} )
mapper.select: select * from t_board_content where 1 = 1 and grp_id = #{grp_id} and del_flag != 'Y' and brd_depth = 0 order by 1 desc;

select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rown, a.* from t_board_content a, (select @rownum:= #{start_page} ) b where a.del_flag != 'Y' and a.grp_id = #{grp_id} and a.brd_depth = 0 order by a.brd_idx desc limit #{start_page}, #{end_page}
select count(*) from t_board_content where 1 = 1 and grp_id = #{grp_id} and del_flag != 'Y'
select * from t_board_content where parent_brd_idx = #{parent_brd_idx} and del_flag != 'Y' and brd_depth >= 1
